title: For Richer Or Poorer NTSC R1 (1997) [ctang]
description:
Plot++++++++++
The incredibly rich, but miserable New York couple, Brad and Caroline Sexton, got framed by their accountant, and fled from the IRS to the one place where noone would look for them: Amish country. Now they've got to do their best to blend in, and learn how to love all over again.

Main Movie++++++++++++++
+Format-NTSC (USA/R1)
+Video-Untouched (Original disc was SL)
+Audio-English, French
+Subs-English, Spanish

Menu+++++++
+Yes
              
Extras/Special Features+++++
+Yes

Removed++++++++++++++
+Nothing

I have also included instructions for editing your DVD's with Elby's CloneDVD2. With this tool you can remove any unwanted junk from your DVD's such as Antipiracy warnings, trailers, and whatever else you may not want. You can also compress your DVD's to DVD-5 (single layer). If you find that I have left something out in the instructions just let me know.

Please Seed!! Don't forget to say thanks!!!

PS: This is not a djfred release, however I have tagged him so that more people see this and it gets more seeders.  The quality is as good or very close to as good as djfred's releases and like his releases, they will always be NTSC R1 with English audio.  Subs will always very from dvd to dvd.
